com.northconcepts.datapipeline.eventbus

Class EventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.northconcepts.datapipeline.eventbus.EventBus

  • public class EventBus
extends Object
    An asynchronous, in-memory, event delivery service. When used with EventBusReader and EventBusWriter, the bus allows pipelines to be loosely coupled and used in one-to-many (publish-subscribe) scenarios.
    See Also:
    EventBusReader, EventBusWriter

    • Field Detail

      • log

        public static final Logger log

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventBus

        public EventBus(ExecutorService executorService)
        Creates a bus using the specified ExecutorService to deliver events to listeners.

      • EventBus

        public EventBus()
        Creates a bus using a single thread to deliver events. This configuration allows the bus to deliver events sequentially to listeners, in the order they were published, while not blocking the publisher.

        public boolean isAlive()
